com.defano.jmonet.tools.base

Interface LinearToolDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LineTool

    public interface LinearToolDelegate
    A delegate class responsible for rendering shapes drawn by the LinearTool.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawLine(Scratch scratch, Stroke stroke, Paint paint, int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Draws a line from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) on the given graphics context.

    • Method Detail

      • drawLine

        void drawLine(Scratch scratch,
              Stroke stroke,
              Paint paint,
              int x1,
              int y1,
              int x2,
              int y2)
        Draws a line from (x1, y1) to (x2, y2) on the given graphics context.
        Parameters:
        scratch - The scratch buffer on which to draw
        stroke - The stroke with which to draw
        paint - The paint with which to draw
        x1 - First x coordinate of the line
        y1 - First y coordinate of the line
        x2 - Second x coordinate of the line
        y2 - Second y coordinate of the line
